mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.caozuorizhi_this_biao as caozuorizhiThisBiao ,a.caozuorizhi_caozuobiao as caozuorizhiCaozuobiao ,a.caozuorizhi_caozuozhanghu as caozuorizhiCaozuozhanghu ,a.caozuorizhi_caozuoleixing as caozuorizhiCaozuoleixing ,a.caozuorizhi_text as caozuorizhiText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM caozuorizhi a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.caozuorizhi_this_biao like CONCAT('%',#{params.caozuorizhiThisBiao},'%')
and a.caozuorizhi_caozuobiao like CONCAT('%',#{params.caozuorizhiCaozuobiao},'%')
and a.caozuorizhi_caozuozhanghu like CONCAT('%',#{params.caozuorizhiCaozuozhanghu},'%')
and a.caozuorizhi_caozuoleixing like CONCAT('%',#{params.caozuorizhiCaozuoleixing},'%')
and a.caozuorizhi_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.caozuorizhiText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
